name: Doliveve Manor Hide and Seek v1
name_original: Doliveve Manor Hide and Seek v1
description:
You are Doliveve, and you're playing hide and seek with your wards. 

Controls: space/enter/z - select/interact with door/hiding spot, up/down/left/right arrow - move

As of version 1, the manor's first floor main area is a playable map, where the wards hide is random, where Doliveve starts is random, what Doliveve looks like is random, seeking game mode is implemented.
